title: I'm in the new client and my desktop icon is missing.
body: I've been playing on the new client for a while now but I still didn't get the option to change the Legacy's Client icon on my desktop. (also opens the Legacy client before the new one) and let's be honest, the new client's icon looks a lot better. so if anyone could help me i'll be more then glad :)

replies.body:
If you want to make a new shortcut for the updated client, you'll need to find the installation folder for your league.

- Navigate to your League directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends by default) 
- Scroll down and you should see a file called LeagueClient
- Right click and select create shortcut!

Let me know if you have any other questions!
My league client file is missing, what do I do then? {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

there is no LeagueClient in (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) but you have to go here C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.105\deploy. I am not sure if the last part changes every patch or not but that is where LeagueClient.exe is located and from that create a shortcut (right click, send to and then click desktop shortcut)
